summary: Quota-crushing AE selling complex SaaS to enterprise and mid-market buyers. Consistent top-10% performance via multi-threaded discovery, crisp ROI, and disciplined pipeline management.

bullets.text: Closed $${X} new ARR across {N} logos in {period}, exceeding quota by {Y}%.
Drove {N} multi-stakeholder evaluations; advanced {M}% to proof-of-value with crisp success criteria.
Expanded {N} existing accounts with {Y}% net revenue retention via value-based renewal motions.
